name: User cross reference EFS-Okta
title: User cross reference EFS-Okta
body:
Original Confluence URL: https://qbdocs.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/IAM/pages/2174713860 - please cross-check the quality of the ZD article with the Confluence counterpart and remove this line before publishing the ZD article

iam_user_reference describes the connection between okta ID and uid in EFS

Status Codes:

const IDP_STATUS_PROVISIONED = 0;
const IDP_STATUS_ACTIVE = 1;
const IDP_STATUS_DEPROVISIONED = -2;
const IDP_STATUS_STAGED = -1;
const IDP_STATUS_PASSWORD_EXPIRED = -3;
const IDP_STATUS_RECOVERY = -4;
const IDP_STATUS_LOCKED_OUT = -5;
const IDP_STATUS_SUSPENDED = -6;
